description.value:
Recipe Price 25 sp
Ingredients 2 basic 1 special
Preparation DC 16 Cooking Lore, DC 18 Survival.
Requirements Basic Kitchen
Favorite Meal As a follower, you can be linked to multiple leads at a time. As an Expert, you can be the lead for as many people as your waffle spread allows.

Flash-cooked on a waffle iron and drizzled with alchemical syrups and compound butter, cooperative waffles bolster the supportive spirit of those who share the batch.

A waffle spread is a batch of cooperative waffles meant to be shared: when ordered, the person who orders the meal designates the flavor and syrup, and offers pieces of the waffle to their companions. After you and up to 6 other companions eat the waffles, you Activate them.

As the person who orders it, you are the Expert; and anytime those you share the meal with uses Follow the Expert to follow you, the circumstance bonus granted is 1 higher.

The waffles' bonus lasts 24 hours or until you next make your daily preparations, whichever comes first. You can only be linked to one lead in this way at a time; if you order or take part in a waffle spread again, the effect of your previous waffles ends.
